subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The freshman guard Jonny Flynn hit a 3-pointer from the top of the key with 5.3 seconds left to break a 68-68 tie, and Syracuse defeated visiting Saint Joseph.
snippet: The freshman guard Jonny Flynn hit a 3-pointer from the top of the key with 5.3 seconds left to break a 68-68 tie, and Syracuse defeated visiting Saint Joseph.
